name: DancePad: Hottest Music Maker for Hip Hop and EDM
name_original: DancePad: Hottest Music Maker for Hip Hop and EDM
description:
Creating Hip hop and EDM has never been so easy.

Dancepad allows you to make live powerful music beats by simply touching 45 different pads.
Listen and play 11 different sounds at once!

The 45 unique sounds include: baselines, drum loops, one shots, sound fx & synths which are labeled clearly on the pads.

Enjoy an auto loop feature that frees you from having to push too many buttons at once, allowing you to focus.

Find us on Instagram as fadgames #idancepad

Another amazing feature is a convenient color-organization method; great for ease & creative expression. It's as easy as holding a button and then pressing the pad that you'd like to change.

We hope that you will check out our other apps in the store. Thank you for downloading this app.

Email us with any comments: fusionaffect@yahoo.com

A quick technical comment for anyone struggling to produce sound. Please check your MUTE* button to see if it is in the correct position.
(*the button on your iPad above your volume controls)
